snippet: The New York Times named Carolyn Ryan, its metropolitan editor, the paper’s top political editor. She will be succeeded by one of her deputies, Wendell Jamieson.
abstract: New York Times names Carolyn Ryan, its metropolitan editor, as newspaper's top political editor; Ryan will be succeeded as metro editor by one of her deputies, Wendell Jamieson.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times named Carolyn Ryan, its metropolitan editor, the paper’s top political editor. She will be succeeded by one of her deputies, Wendell Jamieson.

headline.main: Times Names New Editors for Politics and Metro Desk
headline.print_headline: Times Names New Editors For Politics and Metro Desk
